entry.title: blessedux/Dobber_agent_launchpad: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.
entry.content: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: 707mac/DressTiny: DressTiny is a lightweight e-commerce platform built for the fashion industry, created as a college project. Built using basic JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, the project demonstrates modern front-end development techniques without external frameworks, with an emphasis on clean architecture and responsive design.
entry.content: DressTiny is a lightweight e-commerce platform built for the fashion industry, created as a college project. Built using basic JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, the project demonstrates modern front-end development techniques without external frameworks, with an emphasis on clean architecture and responsive design.
